full_summary:
# Temporary Help Services Requirement

## Requirement Summary
The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking Temporary Help Services under the Supply Arrangement (EN578-172870) for Special Advisor (13.9) category. The requirement is open to qualified suppliers who have been invited to submit a proposal.

## Key Details
- **Solicitation Number:** S4669718
- **Publication Date:** 2024-02-28
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-04 14:30:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
- **Expected Contract End Date:** None
- **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defense
- **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Security Level:** Secret

## Description of the Requirement
The DND requires Temporary Help Services to support various tasks and projects. The services will be provided under the Supply Arrangement EN578-172870, which includes qualified suppliers for the Special Advisor category.

## Level of Security Requirement
The selected resource(s) must meet the minimum security level of Secret.

## Invitation to Bid
The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* 9468269 Canada Corp.
* Access Corporate Technologies Inc.
* Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc.
* Calian Ltd.
* DBHS Security Consulting Inc
* Etico, Inc.
* IBISKA Telecom Inc.
* Michael Wager Consulting Inc.
* Newfound Recruiting Corporation
* Olav Consulting Corp
* Ombre Consulting Services Incorporated
* QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
* Robertson & Company Ltd.
* Taligent Consulting Inc.
* TECH4SOFT INC., Expertise Technology Consulting Inc. (joint venture)

## Instructions for Proposal Submission
Interested suppliers can access the tender documents at: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33069/s4669718-rfp-competitive-method-2-point-rated.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33069/s4669718-rfp-competitive-method-2-point-rated.pdf)

For any questions or queries, please contact CFSG(O-G) Temp Help at CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca or (613) 971-7955.  [1] [1] [1]
